name: RainbowToken
description: RAINBOW is a hyper-deflationary, ethical DeFi token launched on the Binance Smart Chain which combines 7 features into a single cryptoasset. It was launched on 18th August 2021 and is developed and maintained by a team situated in the UK. The RAINBOW team have released a decentralized token launchpad service that specializes in user friendliness, flexibility and low fees. $RAINBOW will be used to reduce launch fees for developers on this platform.
